name: family-tree-graph
description: A D3 family tree graph generated from a GRAMPS XML export
author: Trygve Wastvedt <trygve.wastvedt@gmail.com>

scripts.ts: browserify src/ts/main.ts typings/main.d.ts typings/custom.d.ts --debug -p [ tsify --noImplicitAny ] -o dist/js/bundle.js
scripts.watch-ts: watchify src/ts/main.ts typings/main.d.ts typings/custom.d.ts --debug -p [ tsify --noImplicitAny ] -o dist/js/bundle.js -v
scripts.watch-css: npm run css & npm run css -- -w src/scss/index.scss
scripts.watch: parallelshell "npm run watch-assets" "npm run watch-ts" "npm run watch-css"
scripts.dev: parallelshell "npm run watch" "npm run livereload" "npm run serve"
